subject: Decisions and Verdicts
Suits and Litigation
Basketball
Sexual Harassment
lead_paragraph: The jury in Anucha Browne Sanders’s lawsuit against Madison Square Garden and Isiah Thomas deliberated for seven and a half hours, but did not reach a verdict.
snippet: The jury in Anucha Browne Sanders’s lawsuit against Madison Square Garden and Isiah Thomas deliberated for seven and a half hours, but did not reach a verdict.
